Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Cermak-Chinatown. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Cermak-Chinatown. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
